title: Unknown blackletter face "Hinton & Alfert"
content:
Check here: [http://eccentrifuge.com/Fonts/blackletter.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051818/http:/eccentrifuge.com/Fonts/blackletter.html)   
   
John Butler's "Barrel of Blackletters" is the most complete source I've found.
author: scoles
